Thank you all, I am still thinking ... :)

Testing is unavoidable!
"Design By Contracts", and "Defensive Programming" will enhance quality for sure, but will not enable you to get rid of testing.
You can continue without "Unit Testing" and without even "QC" team, but at the end of the day there should be someone who will test your application, better to be from your side than from the customer's side.

There is a methodology called PSP that target zero defect code. You can read more about it here http://www.sei.cmu.edu/reports/09sr018.pdf
SECC deliver official PSP courses if you would like to attend one.
